::Astroblast/Switchblade::

Astroblast closes his hatch. "As you command, Megatron." He 
commences lift off, and starts to head for the CF.

-------------

Switchblade groans, as he hears Megatron's orders, but he 
reluctantly complies. "Ok Motormaster, lets just hurry this up..." 
He waits for the Stunticons to arrive.


On 17 Apr 2001, at 4:37, gestalt_menasor@... wrote:

> Speedbreaker looked at Drag Strip evily, and grabbed Symphony, and 
> began to fly towards Megatron. Beastbox jumped up and transformed into 
> his small cassette mode, heading towards Drag Strip.
> 
> -------------------------------------------------
> Astroblast's hatch opened up, and Megatron walked out, followed by 
> Motormaster. The two large and destructive robots looked at the 
> Stunticons then the robot in the pod. "Status report Wildrider" 
> Motormaster's emotionless voice boomed. " Well this Decepticon pod got 
> shot down, but her circuitry is damaged, and she dosent remember who 
> she is sir" Wildrider said steping back. "Hmmmmm" Megatron 
> contemplated. "Get into the ship" he ordered to her. "Motormaster, you 
> wait for the other Stunticons to arrive, then head towards the CF". 
> Megatron then enters Astroblast again, "You will fly me to the CF, 
> then you will return to base, understood?" He asked Astroblast, and 
> then waited for Cepta. 
> 
> "Switchblade, you ride with me" commanded Motormaster.
> 
>
